trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" /> 的 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventHandler> delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.

You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>类通过指定一个名为子例程**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>构造<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>对象使用当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>和将其传递给**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>对象提供给**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>向自定义<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>期间属性**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**使用事件、 窗体身份验证票证的 cookie 或 URL 中提供的标识。

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件才会引发时身份验证<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms>和<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object with a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>到<xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal>具有自定义对象<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>。
